UMCS.Games
Class MTRandomGame

  |

        +--UMCS.Games.RandomGame

              +--UMCS.Games.MTRandomGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class MTRandomGame
extends RandomGame
implements Game

MERSENNE TWISTER RANDOM GAME Implements an incremental random game tree (for OmSearch and PromSearch). Gives evaluations simultaneously for a set of opponents. The Branchingfactor is selected randomly per child between minwidth and maxwidth (inclusive). Parent node base[0] is used as random seed for children. Games played with the same start move will be identical, independent of the used search algorithm. This version uses the MersenneTwister random number generator

Version:
September 2000
Author:
Jeroen Donkers
